message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. I'll take 6000 and you get 4000.  We get to keep something, and this keeps us from losing out to the next round!

Alice, since you face a 10% penalty each round and I don't, this is actually a fair offer. If you reject, your share will be worth even less next round. Let's make a deal now that works for both of us.
Bob, I know inflation is hitting me harder, but I still think we can do better. I propose 5500 for me, 4500 for you.  Let's end this here and keep our money.
